attributes.action:
Review the Yellow Box Junction Law.
The Councils misusing Law, earning millions
attributes.additional_details:
The intention of Honourable MPs for the Yellow Box junction law were not to generate money but to ensure smooth flow of traffic from the right in the event of heavy traffic on the main road.

If the council were not stopped they will also convert  KEEP CLEAR and T- Junctions into Yellow box junctions and will install CCTV to generate millions.
attributes.background: The law is being misused by Local councils as a business by installing more cameras and Yellow box junctions and generate millions by issuing tickets for few seconds.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly how you would like the law to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
